decisions.description:
nCino's general purpose Record-Trigger flows are designed to bucket interactions into distinct pillars.
1. On Create. These actions occur at the time the record is created. 2. Progression (if applicable). These actions occur when a core process on the record progresses forward or backward. These should be picklists (Example: Loan Stage). 3. Adhoc. All other actions which occur when distinct criteria are met.
A "skip" function is build into start conditions. This flow will not execute when the "Exclude Flow" permission set is assigned to the running user.
